summary: This is a staff assignment memo from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 12, 2019, advising that two staff members, T. Noel and M. Thomas, are prohibited from entering or working in any Special Housing Unit (SHU) post until further notice, pending approval of the Captain.

events.title: Staff Assignment Restriction Issued
events.description: A memo is issued advising that staff members T. Noel and M. Thomas cannot enter, perform work, or be assigned to any Special Housing Unit (SHU) post until further notice, pending approval of the Captain.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The memo is dated August 12, 2019, which is two days after Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Two staff members, T. Noel and M. Thomas, are restricted from Special Housing Unit (SHU) posts.
The restriction is effective immediately and until further notice, requiring the Captain's approval for any change.
The document originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Epstein was held.
The timing suggests this may be part of the internal response or investigation following Epstein's death.
